creator: apache@aable.com
text:
In the current implementation, when an application restarts, the
new log data is appended to the latest log. It should instead,
rollover() the logs and start writing to a new log. Otherwise,
It's difficult to locate the latest log data.

You can set
  log4j.appender.A1.Append=false
But that removes the latest log file.

Mike
This bug has been fixed in log4j 1.2.
